mysterious_shrine.title: Mysterious Shrine
mysterious_shrine.text: You come across an ancient shrine covered in moss. A faint hum emanates from within.

cursed_book.title: The Cursed Book
cursed_book.text: A leather-bound book lies in the middle of the path. It pulses with a dark energy.

choices.text: Read it (Gain Rare Card, Lose 10 HP)

lost_adventurer.title: Lost Adventurer
lost_adventurer.text: A ragged traveler stumbles out of the bush. 'Please,' he gasps, 'I need help... or perhaps a trade?'

choices.text: Give Potion (Heal him - Gain Rare Relic/Card)

whispering_roots.title: Whispering Roots
whispering_roots.text: Roots curl around your ankles, not trapping you, but guiding you towards a glowing pool purely made of mana.

choices.text: Bottle it (Gain Energy Potion - placeholder: Gain Gold)
